Uses of Package
healpix.plot3d.canvas3d

Packages that use healpix.plot3d.canvas3d
healpix.plot3d.canvas3d This package contains the canvas classes related to construct a 3d scene with a data color bar, axis and equator. 
healpix.plot3d.gui This package contains the Graphical User Interface to give 3d interactive viewer. 
healpix.plot3d.gui.healpix3d This package contains the java3d classes to plot a healpix map on a 3D sphere to interact with. 
healpix.plot3d.gui.view This package contains view classes (frames) used by the Graphical User Interface classes. 
 

Classes in healpix.plot3d.canvas3d used by healpix.plot3d.canvas3d
ColorBar
          Displaying a bar of colors (the scale) using a ColorTransform and the min and max values.
ColorTransform
          Interface that deals with color transformations
 

Classes in healpix.plot3d.canvas3d used by healpix.plot3d.gui
MapCanvas
          Create Canvas 3D with tooltip behaviour and Color bar min/max displayed.
 

Classes in healpix.plot3d.canvas3d used by healpix.plot3d.gui.healpix3d
MapCanvas
          Create Canvas 3D with tooltip behaviour and Color bar min/max displayed.
 

Classes in healpix.plot3d.canvas3d used by healpix.plot3d.gui.view
MapCanvas
          Create Canvas 3D with tooltip behaviour and Color bar min/max displayed.
